channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Loving Pablo
channel.desc: Action 2017 Virginia Vallejo, Colombia's most celebrated journalist, interviews Pablo Escobar, the infamous drug kingpin she becomes passionately involved with, even as his illegal operations plunge the country into chaos. Javier Bardem, Penelope Cruz, Peter Sarsgaard, Julieth Restrepo, ?scar Jaenada, Fernando Leon de Aranoa , Fernando Leon de Aranoa , Fernando Leon de Aranoa, Fernando Leon de Aranoa, Oscar Jaenada.
